name: Standball (itch)
description:
What will you do if you meet a person who has nothing but a dream ... dreams to change his life?

In this place there are such people. They have nothing but this dream. Many of them are trying to get out of this place. Someone throws this venture after the first attempt. Someone stops in the middle. And only a few, after going through this difficult path, succeed. Someone has to go this way alone. But this person was lucky to meet you!
Help balance on the ball and make it so that everyone will like it. You will have to go through pain and humiliation to gain freedom.

Features:
  • Masks affecting story
  • Gameplay modifications
  • Minimalistic design
  • With meaning
